# NSFW Telegram Directory

> A curated directory and review site for NSFW Telegram channels, groups, and bots.

This site reviews and rates adult-oriented Telegram channels across 8 categories:
- Adult Content Channels
- OnlyFans & Creator Leaks
- Dating & Hookup Groups
- NSFW Bots
- Hentai & Anime
- NSFW Stickers
- Gay & LGBTQ+
- Couples & Swinger Groups

## What We Do
We evaluate NSFW Telegram channels based on content quality, posting frequency, moderation, community engagement, and safety practices. Each listing includes a rating, pros/cons, features, and member estimates.

## What We Don't Do
We do not host any NSFW content directly. This is a directory and review site only, similar to how PCMag reviews software.

## Content
- 30+ channel listings with detailed reviews
- Category pages for browsing
- "Best of" comparison pages
- Alternatives pages for each channel
- Side-by-side comparison pages
- Blog articles with guides and tips

## Important
- All content is 18+ only
- We encourage supporting creators directly
- Always protect your privacy on Telegram
- Exercise caution with meetup groups

## URLs
- Homepage: /
- Categories: /categories
- Listings: /listing/{slug}
- Alternatives: /alternatives/{slug}
- Comparisons: /compare/{slug-a}-vs-{slug-b}
- Best of: /best/nsfw-telegram-channels, /best/telegram-dating-groups, /best/nsfw-telegram-bots
- Blog: /blog
